metadata.Title: CVE-2014-125006 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found inFFmpeg 2.0. Affected by this issue is the function output_frame of the filelibavcodec/h264.c. The manipulation leads to memory corruption. The attackmay be launched remotely. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix thisissue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
